title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Enhancing Social Sector Job Skills through Educational Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or higher participation rates using gamification elements

Learners can select one social issue (e.g., community conflict, environmental problem) in a 4-member collaborative project, specify solutions in three stages (problem definition, strategy development, implementation plan), create a 10-minute presentation, and achieve an average ≥4.0 in peer evaluations (5-point scale).
Learners establish self-directed learning plans based on experience points earned during gamification activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
